name: Katrien Verbert
content: Katrien Verbert — Augment Professor - Augment research group Department of Computer Science, KU Leuven Celestijnenlaan 200A - box 2402 B-3001 Leuven, Belgium phone+32-16-328286 emailkatrien.verbert@cs.kuleuven.be Research profile I am a professor at the Augment research group of the HCI division of the Computer Science Departement at KU Leuven. My research interests include human-centred explainable AI, interactive recommender systems,  visual analytics and applications in learning analytics, healthcare, precision agriculture, media consumption and digital humanities. Publications and recent talks Publications listed on Lirias, DBLP, Google Scholar Recent talks Organisational activities IUI 2025: program chair of the 30th ACM Conference on Intelligent User Interfaces RecSys 2024: program chair of the 18th ACM Conference on Recommender Systems Associate Editor IEEE Transactions on Learning Technologies IUI 2021: general co-chair of the 26th International Conference on Intelligent User Interfaces LAK 2020: program chair of the 10th International Conference on Learning Analytics and Knowledge LAK 2019: student consortium chair of the 9th International Conference on Learning Analytics and Knowledge UMAP 2019: track co-chair of the 27th ACM Conference on User Modelling, Adaptation and Personalization IUI 2017: student consortium chair of the 22nd International Conference on Intelligent User Interfaces EC-TEL 2017: general  chair of the 21th European Conference on Technology Enhanced Learning EC-TEL 2016: program  chair of the 11th European Conference on Technology Enhanced Learning EDM 2015: workshop chair of the 8th International Conference on Educational Data Mining LAK 2013: program chair of the international conference on Learning Analytics and Knowledge RecSysTEL workshop 2010, 2012 at RecSys 2010 and ECTEL 2010, 2012 (workshop chair) RecSysChallenge at RecSys 2012 (track chair) Stellar Alpine Rendez-Vous workshops 2009, 2011 (workshop chair) Teaching 2017 - ....: Fundamentals of Human-Computer Interaction at KU Leuven 2016 - ....: Information Visualisation at KU Leuven 2015 - ...: Data Visualisation at KU Leuven 2015 - ...: Web Information Systems at KU Leuven 2013 - 2015: Information Visualization at VUB 2013 - 2014: Web Technology at TU/e 2009 - 2012: Databases at KU Leuven (30%, with Bettina Berendt and Erik Duval) 2008 - 2009: Multimedia at KU Leuven (30%, with Erik Duval) Tweets by AugmentHCI keyboard_arrow_up To homepage kuleuven.be
